Name: Bad cat Sam
About the game: The cat, named serious Sam , is very upset when the house is in order and everything is in its place. Help Sam get inner peace. The main task of the game is to spoil the life of the residents of the house. Playing as a cat, you will need to destroy everything around and not get caught by the owners of the house. Improvise, think over your moves in advance. Happy New Year from 'Victoria Game' / Features of the game 16 levels (we are sure you will not be able to pass all the levels from 1 time). Colorful graphics. Funny pranks (we broke our heads here while we came up with everything). Some levels are very difficult (test your strength). All this with cheerful music! ðŸ˜Ž
